description: Coordinates sub-agents to analyze finances, match opportunities, and prepare execution bundles with reasoning manifests

actionable_recommendations.title: Cancel Unused Subscriptions (Hulu Basic & Office Productivity Suite)
actionable_recommendations.description: Eliminate recurrent charges for subscriptions with no recent activity, freeing up $19.98/month and saving $239.76 each year.
actionable_recommendations.action_required: Approve and execute cancellation of Hulu Basic and Office Productivity Suite subscriptions.

actionable_recommendations.title: Transfer Surplus Cash to High-Yield Savings
actionable_recommendations.description: Move $2,500 of idle cash from checking to a high-yield savings account for passive growth and better liquidity safety buffer.
actionable_recommendations.action_required: Approve and execute transfer to designated high-yield savings account.

actionable_recommendations.title: Invest $1,500 in 12-Month Certificate of Deposit (CD)
actionable_recommendations.description: Allocate a portion of surplus into a 12-month Ally CD at 4.15% APY to secure steady, low-risk annual interest.
actionable_recommendations.action_required: Approve investment into 12-month CD; be aware of early withdrawal penalties.

reasoning_manifest.analysis_approach: Synthesized expense analysis, cash flow, and detected financial inefficiencies to calculate actionable surplus and optimize based on conservative risk tolerance. Used executed sub-agent output and direct analysis.
key_assumptions: No pending large transactions or debts.
Surplus is calculated after resolving anomalies (subscription cancellation).
risk_considerations: All recommendations maintain a cash buffer to handle emergencies.
CD investment matches conservative risk profile; illiquidity is a minor risk.
There is no risk to canceling truly unused subscriptions.
reasoning_manifest.decision_rationale: Maximize idle capital via low-risk vehicles and immediate cost elimination, preserving liquidity and aligning to conservative profile.

next_steps.step: Approve and execute cancellation of unused subscriptions.
Approve fund transfer from checking to high-yield savings.
next_steps.timeline: Immediate, funding clears in 1 business day.

next_steps.step: Allocate $1,500 into 12-month CD upon surplus realization.
next_steps.timeline: Within 1 day after surplus is available.

test_error: Agent test timed out after 30 seconds
